skill.name: character-development-assistant
skill.description: Creates detailed character profiles including backstory, personality traits, motivations, relationships, and character arcs. Use when the user needs help developing compelling, multi-dimensional characters for their story.

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown instructions for AI-assisted character development. No executable code, no file access, no network calls, no external commands. This skill generates text output based on user input and provides creative writing guidance.

content.user_title: Develop compelling character profiles for stories
content.value_statement: Flat characters derail reader engagement. This skill creates multi-dimensional characters with backstories, motivations, relationships, and character arcs that drive your narrative forward.
actual_capabilities: Create detailed character profiles with backstory and origin stories
Define personality traits including strengths, flaws, quirks, and speech patterns
Map character relationships, dynamics, and conflict points
Design character arcs with transformation stages and arc types
Generate motivation frameworks with external goals and internal needs
Create character sheets for any genre from fantasy to contemporary
limitations: Does not write scenes or dialogue featuring the character
Does not generate plot outlines or story structures
Does not provide genre-specific writing craft advice
Requires user to provide basic character concept to start

use_cases.title: Build protagonist depth
use_cases.description: Develop complex protagonists with clear arcs, internal conflicts, and transformation paths that carry your novel forward

use_cases.title: Create supporting characters
use_cases.description: Design memorable supporting characters that serve plot function while feeling like real people with their own goals

use_cases.title: Design NPCs with purpose
use_cases.description: Create non-player characters with consistent personalities, motivations, and relationships that enhance player immersion

prompt_templates.title: Basic character creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a character profile for a [role] in a [genre] story. Character name: [name]. Basic concept: [brief idea]. Include backstory, personality traits, motivations, and potential character arc.

prompt_templates.title: Deepen existing character
prompt_templates.prompt: This character feels one-dimensional: [existing description]. Give them contradictions that create internal conflict, formative events that shaped them, and a flaw that will cause problems in the story.

prompt_templates.title: Map character relationships
prompt_templates.prompt: Create relationship profiles between [Character A] and [Character B]. Include relationship type, how they push each other, specific conflict points, and how the relationship changes both characters through the story.

prompt_templates.title: Design transformation arc
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a [positive/negative/flat] arc for [character name]. Include their starting belief, inciting incident, midpoint realization, crisis point, and final transformation. Show how they change the world or how the world changes them.

output_examples.input: Create a character profile for a teenage protagonist in a contemporary drama who discovers their parents are hiding a family secret.
output: Core wound: Fear of abandonment after being left at grandparents' for a summer as a child
Strength: Perceptive and analytical (notices what others miss)
Flaw: Withholds trust once betrayed, struggles to forgive
External goal: Discover the family secret and decide whether to confront parents
Internal need: Learn that people keep secrets out of love, not deception
Greatest fear: Being lied to by the people closest to him
Key relationship: Best friend who knows about the investigation and must choose between loyalty and keeping Alex safe from what they discover

best_practices: Give characters contradictions that create internal tension between who they are and who they want to be
Ensure flaws actually cause problems in scenes rather than being decorative traits
Connect formative backstory events directly to present behavior so readers understand why characters act as they do
anti_patterns: Creating characters whose strengths never fail them and flaws never serve them
Backstory that has no connection to current plot motivations
Character arcs where the person at the end is exactly the same as the beginning

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. The prompts are designed for reasoning models that can follow structured creative writing instructions.

faq.question: What genres does this skill support?
faq.answer: Universal framework for any genre including fantasy, sci-fi, contemporary, historical, horror, romance, and literary fiction.

faq.question: How detailed are the character profiles?
faq.answer: Profiles include physical appearance, personality, backstory, motivations, fears, relationships, and full character arc mapping with transformation stages.

faq.question: Is user data stored or shared?
faq.answer: Pure prompt-based skill with no data storage. All character development happens in the AI conversation session only.

faq.question: Can I use generated characters in published work?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill generates original character concepts based on your input. You own and can use any characters created through this skill.

faq.question: How is this different from general creative writing AI?
faq.answer: Focused specifically on character development with structured frameworks for personality, motivation, relationships, and transformation arcs rather than prose or plot.
